original_text: Then the five men departed and came to Laish and saw the people who were there, how they lived in security, after the manner of the Sidonians, quiet and unsuspecting, lacking nothing that is in the earth and possessing wealth, and how they were far from the Sidonians and had no dealings with anyone.
korean_text: 이에 다섯 사람이 떠나 라이스에 이르러 거기 있는 백성을 본즉 염려 없이 거주하며 시돈 사람들이 사는 것처럼 평온하며 안전하니 그 땅에는 부족한 것이 없으며 부를 누리며 시돈 사람들과 거리가 멀고 어떤 사람과도 상종하지 아니함이라

sentences.original_text: and saw the people who were there
after the manner of the Sidonians
lacking nothing that is in the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 있는 것 중에 부족한 것이 없고

sentences.original_text: and how they were far from the Sidonians
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 시돈 사람들에게서 멀리 떨어져 있었는지

sentences.original_text: and had no dealings with anyone
